p: Accordingly, we used remdesivir as a reference ligand. Moreover, based on our previous study, we decided to dock to SARS-CoV-2 proteins betulinic acid and 30-diethoxyphosphoryl-3- O-(3′,3′-dimethylsuccinyl)betulinic acid (compound 6, Figure 7). Compound 6 demonstrated in vitro anti-HIV-1 activity with an IC 50 value similar to that of BVM (IC 50 = 0.02 µM and 0.03 µM for 6 and BVM, respectively), and with a lower cytotoxicity (CC 50 = 68 µM and 29 µM for 6 and BVM, respectively) [ 12].
